project_preview_description.text: Compares the product's price in several Colombian marketplaces.

project_description.text: This is a work in progress. Queryfy aims to simplify comparing the same product across several Colombian marketplaces. It was developed in 48h and is currently working with 4 different marketplaces. It was built using ReactJS, Tailwind, NodeJS, Express and Puppeteer.

siteMetadata.title: Juan Murillo
siteMetadata.description: Colombian Software Engineer passionate about web development and coffee.
